definition: A concise summary or understanding of a situation, topic, or set of information, often used to refer to a general understanding or grasp of a subject matter. It is commonly used to describe the ability to comprehend or have an overview of something, such as a concept, a plan, or a collection of data.

examples.german: Kannst du mir einen Überblick über das Projekt geben?
examples.english: Can you give me an overview of the project?

examples.german: Der Artikel gibt einen guten Überblick über das Thema.
examples.english: The article provides a good overview of the topic.

examples.german: Sie hat einen klaren Überblick über ihre Finanzen.
examples.english: She has a clear overview of her finances.
